alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:30PM EDT until July 24 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON AND NORTHEASTERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES... At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Mount Morris, or 7 miles east of Letchworth State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dansville, Groveland, Nunda, Ossian, Canaseraga, Sonyea, Dalton, Ossian Center and Swain. This includes Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
